snippet: The authorities said Monday that they had arrested four Saudis and four Tanzanians in connection with the bombing of a Catholic church in Arusha on Sunday that killed two people and wounded 60.
abstract: Tanzanian authorities say that they have arrested four men from Saudi Arabia and four Tanzanians in connection with bombing of a Catholic church in city of Arusha that killed two people and wounded 60.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said Monday that they had arrested four Saudis and four Tanzanians in connection with the bombing of a Catholic church in Arusha on Sunday that killed two people and wounded 60.

headline.seo: Tanzania: Suspects in Church Blast Include 4 Saudis
headline.main: Tanzania: Suspects in Church Blast Include 4 Saudis
headline.print_headline: Tanzania: Suspects in Church Blast Include 4 Saudis
